item.description:
We will begin a program that helps our members learn how to create an E-Book document to help promote their business, establish trust and nurture leads. It will be an on-going program with weekly updates as we take our participants thru all the necessary steps.

The goal will be to have each participant develop a basic E-book; activate & utilize all the required tools to build, distribute and market their new engagement vehicle and come away with a completed project they can actually put to use on their website.

We plan to present the program, findings and case studies as part of FutureM week in September.

 

Stay tuned for more info - we'll have it finalized by Friday.
item.name: Rapid E-Book Publishing Program
